7.eng-name: The Book of the Adhan (The Call to Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Mu'awiyah bin Hudaij that the Messenger of Allah (S.A.W) prayed one day and said the Taslim when there was still a Rak'ah left of the prayer. A man caught up with him and said:'You forgot a Rak'ah of the prayer!' So he came back into the Masjid and told Bilal to call the Iqamah for prayer, then he led the people in praying one Rak'ah. I told the people about that and they said to me: 'Do you know who that man was?' I said: 'No, not unless I see him.'. Then he passed by me and I said: 'This is he.' They said: 'This is Talha bin 'Ubaidullah

chapter.ara-name: باب الإِقَامَةِ لِمَنْ نَسِيَ رَكْعَةً مَنْ صَلاَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: The Iqamah For One Who Forgot A Rak'ah Of The Prayer
